B2 A person's forties are the period in which they are aged between 40 and 49: in your forties She's probably in her early forties. the forties
the range of temperature between 40° and 49°: in the forties The temperature is expected to be in the forties tomorrow.
B2 the decade (= period of ten years) between 40 and 49 in any century, usually 1940–1949: in the forties Our house was built some time in the forties.
